titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 4'-methoxy-2,2',4-trimethyl diphenylamine.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/23/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 4'-methoxy-2,2',4-trimethyl diphenylamine.
